privacyPolicy:
Privacy Policy of Aura de Mallorca Hotel

Effective Date: 01-12-2023

The privacy of our users is of utmost importance to Aura de Mallorca Hotel. In this policy, we explain how we collect, use, disclose, and manage the personal information of our users.

1. Information Collected:

a. Reservations:
When making a reservation on our website, we collect your full name, email address, DNI and payment details. We may also collect additional information such as room preferences and dietary requirements if you choose to provide them.

b. User Accounts:
When creating an account on our website, we collect your full name, email address, DNI and password. You may also choose to provide additional information, such as a profile picture.

2. Use of Information:

a. Reservations:
We use the information collected during the reservation process to manage your booking, send confirmations, provide information about additional services, and ensure a comfortable stay.

b. User Accounts:
Account information is used to manage your account, enable access to exclusive features, and personalize your experience on our site.

3. Disclosure of Information:

a. Trusted Third Parties:
We may share your information with trusted third parties, such as payment processors, to facilitate secure transactions.

b. Legal Compliance:
We will disclose personal information when required by law or in response to valid legal requests.

4. Security:

We implement appropriate security measures to protect personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

5. Cookies:

We use cookies to improve the user experience. You can adjust cookie settings in your browser according to your preferences.

6. Updates and Changes:

We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Updates will be published on our website with the corresponding effective date.

7. User Rights:

You have the right to access, correct, delete, or object to the processing of your personal information. Contact us via nano9gs@hotmail.es to exercise these rights.

8. Contact:

For questions about this privacy policy or any privacy-related concerns, please contact us via nano9gs@hotmail.es.
